description: Impersonations from Jamie Foxx, plus a few of his songs from his "Peep This" album.
keywords: stand up,tv special,concert film,live performance,live audience
name: Jamie Foxx: Straight from the Foxxhole

original_info.id: Jamie Foxx: Straight from the Foxxhole_2004
original_info.name: Jamie Foxx: Straight from the Foxxhole

review.name: Jamie Foxx is a natural
review.reviewBody: Jamie Foxx's stand up comedy special: Straight from the Foxxhole is genuinely cosmic! It's original, it's fresh, it's funny, it's unique. Sure, it's loaded with profanity and swears, but you tend to drown out these facts because you're roaring with laughter. He has a gift for entertaining his audience by drawing them into his comedy structure in a very natural way. Every punch line was so hilarious. The moment I turned it on, I couldn't turn it off. It was inevitable that this young talent would flourish into the Academy Award winner he is today. I say bravo Jamie! If you're reading this and you plan to watch this show, get ready for a roller-coaster ride of straight comedy. Jamie Foxx is a hoot! Impressive...
